text: @wittelstephanie You can’t spin a pandemic even with BS level artistry. Anyone feel re-assured by today’s speech? What about the ability to test all brk outs  and non clusters? Funds for hospitals to scale up (beds,ventilators, PPE’s) for all health workers. FEMA activation
